ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // Hmmn, now this is something,
I never thought anyone
would ever climb up here.{PAUSE}Your eyes are different.
Well, anyhow.
Any minute now, this will be
a battlefield against Shinra.{PAUSE}You'd better get down
before you get involved.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // Hmmn, now this is something,
I never thought anyone
would ever climb up here.{PAUSE}Any minute now, this will be
a battlefield against Shinra.
You'd better get down
before you get involved.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:17}); // It appears you have a problem
with Shinra, too.
After all, you climbed up here.{PAUSE}Why not listen to
what I have to say for a moment?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:28}); // Do you know what's at
the top of this mountain?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:41}); // That's right, on that mountain is
a Condor and a reactor.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:40}); // I can see you're very perceptive.
Yes, it's a reactor and a Condor.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:42}); // It seems the Shinra doesn't like
the idea of having a Condor
on top of the reactor.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:52}); // It seems there's some type of
special Materia
in the reactor above us.{PAUSE}And because the Condor came,
the Shinra rushed troops here.{PAUSE}The military wants to get
the Condor and all the villagers
off this mountain.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:53}); // The Condor is now warming
its egg, which hatches only
once every few years.{PAUSE}We would like to protect the Condor
from being harmed.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:64}); // Unfortunately, we don't have
the ability to fight
Shinra ourselves.{PAUSE}That's why we have hired
soldiers to help us.{PAUSE}As our sponsor, you can help us
with a contribution or
by fighting alongside of us{PAUSE}What do you think?
You want to join us in our fight?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:93}); // Have you by chance
changed your mind?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:145}); // Oh, it's you guys?
How are things going?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:146}); // Up to now,
you've lost {MEM1} times.
If you lose too many times,
you won't be able to come back.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:96}); // Ask my son, who's standing
guard at the shed,
about anything related to
our military tactics.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:96}); // Ask my son, who's standing
guard at the shed,
about anything related to
our military tactics.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:97}); // Yes, yes, I've also told
the store owners about you,
so they should sell you
various items.{PAUSE}And feel free to use our beds.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:155}); // {Yuffie}
Come on
break time, break time!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:150}); // {Barret}
Ey, let's get some rest.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:154}); // {Red XIII}
Let's take a break
when we can afford to.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:153}); // {Red XIII}
We should get some rest
while we can.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:158}); // {Cid}
Come on,
let's get some shut-eye.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:157}); // {Vincent}
It's probably best to
get some rest now.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:156}); // {Cait Sith}
Now, shall we get some rest?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:150}); // {Barret}
Ey, let's get some rest.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:158}); // {Cid}
Come on,
let's get some shut-eye.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:154}); // {Red XIII}
Let's take a break
when we can afford to.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:153}); // {Red XIII}
We should get some rest
while we can.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:155}); // {Yuffie}
Come on
break time, break time!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:157}); // {Vincent}
It's probably best to
get some rest now.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:156}); // {Cait Sith}
Now, shall we get some rest?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:150}); // {Barret}
Ey, let's get some rest.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:154}); // {Red XIII}
Let's take a break
when we can afford to.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:153}); // {Red XIII}
We should get some rest
while we can.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:155}); // {Yuffie}
Come on
break time, break time!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:157}); // {Vincent}
It's probably best to
get some rest now.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:156}); // {Cait Sith}
Now, shall we get some rest?
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:1, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:98}); // I'm begging you.
Please prevent the reactor
from being destroyed and
the Condor from being killed.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:99}); // You've come at a good time.
Shinra's changing its strategy now.{PAUSE}It seems that Shinra will destroy
the reactor and then take out
the Materia that's inside.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:110}); // Yes, yes, and there's one thing
I forgot to tell you
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:143}); // Received Key Item "Huge Materia"!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:120}); // The truth is, this is the Materia
inside the reactor.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:124}); // We weren't protectin' the reactor,
we were protectin' the Condor.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:125}); // When that reactor was built,
they forced us to help.
That's how we knew what was
inside the reactor.{PAUSE}I knew this day would come,
so after the Shinra left,
I sneaked in and
took the Materia.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:126}); // I didn't mean to fool you, but
I guess that's how it ended up.
I'm really sorry.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:130}); // I see.
If you put it that way
we're really grateful.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // Hmmn, now this is something,
I never thought anyone
would ever climb up here.{PAUSE}Your eyes are different.
Well, anyhow.
Any minute now, this will be
a battlefield against Shinra.{PAUSE}You'd better get down
before you get involved.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // Hmmn, now this is something,
I never thought anyone
would ever climb up here.{PAUSE}Any minute now, this will be
a battlefield against Shinra.
You'd better get down
before you get involved.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:17}); // It appears you have a problem
with Shinra, too.
After all, you climbed up here.{PAUSE}Why not listen to
what I have to say for a moment?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:28}); // Do you know what's at
the top of this mountain?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:41}); // That's right, on that mountain is
a Condor and a reactor.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:40}); // I can see you're very perceptive.
Yes, it's a reactor and a Condor.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:144}); // Looks like there's a special Materia
up in the Mako reactor.{PAUSE}Then came the Condor,
so Shinra dispatched the troops
to get rid of it.{PAUSE}Their plan is to get rid of
the Condor and the people on this
mountain and to get the Materia
from the Mako Reactor.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:64}); // Unfortunately, we don't have
the ability to fight
Shinra ourselves.{PAUSE}That's why we have hired
soldiers to help us.{PAUSE}As our sponsor, you can help us
with a contribution or
by fighting alongside of us{PAUSE}What do you think?
You want to join us in our fight?

climbLadder({x:207, y:908, z:580, triangleId:89, advanceKey:Key.Down, animationId:5, facingDirection:144, speed:1});

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:34}); // {Cloud}
The reactor and the Condor.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:92}); // I see
Come back if you should
change your mind.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:95}); // Whew, we'll be saved.{PAUSE}Ask my son, who's standing
guard at the shed,
about the details of
our military tactics.
We're depending on you.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:100}); // {Cloud}
I see. I guess that means
this area, too.{PAUSE}Well, we can't afford to
lose any more.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:121}); // {Cloud}
Then you're telling me
we protected a reactor that
didn't have any Materia inside?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:127}); // {Cloud}
Well
Maybe it was for the best.{PAUSE}Besides, there was no guarantee
we'd defeat Shinra.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:10}); // {Aeris}
What do you mean,
'a battlefield'?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:23}); // {Aeris}
After all, we came all this way,
{Cloud}

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:57}); // {Aeris}
We must protect
the condor egg, right?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:68}); // {Aeris}
{Cloud}, why are you
still worrying about it?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:78}); // {Aeris}
What a jerk.
I'm disappointed in you.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:86}); // {Aeris}
Yes, yes.
Let's do our best.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:103}); // {Aeris}
We can't afford to be beaten!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:8}); // {Barret}
Shinra?
The hell those jackasses
doing here?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:21}); // {Barret}
The hell you talkin' about!?
They're all fightin'
the Shinra too!
You gonna ignore that!?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:43}); // {Barret}
Damn, that's one big bird!
But why are they trying to get
rid of it with weapons?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:55}); // {Barret}
I'll do it!
I'll protect them from Shinra!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:66}); // {Barret}
What's there to think about?
We gotta do it!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:76}); // {Barret}
What's wrong with you?
And you call yourself a human!?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:85}); // {Barret}
Hey!
We'll come to the rescue.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:101}); // {Barret}
Man, we're walking on
dangerous ground.
We can't lose now!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:113}); // {Barret}
Damn man, it's Huge Materia.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:132}); // {Barret}
We gotta get there first and
beat 'em no matter what!
climbLadder({x:-403, y:73, z:-120, triangleId:143, advanceKey:Key.Up, animationId:3, facingDirection:192, speed:1});
climbLadder({x:-407, y:94, z:-497, triangleId:153, advanceKey:Key.Down, animationId:3, facingDirection:192, speed:1});

climbLadder({x:879, y:744, z:1114, triangleId:168, advanceKey:Key.Up, animationId:5, facingDirection:96, speed:1});
climbLadder({x:943, y:795, z:671, triangleId:86, advanceKey:Key.Down, animationId:5, facingDirection:96, speed:1});

climbLadder({x:1140, y:228, z:694, triangleId:26, advanceKey:Key.Up, animationId:5, facingDirection:96, speed:1});

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:22}); // {Tifa}
{Cloud}, let's listen to
what they have to say.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:31}); // {Tifa}
Come on, let's get it together.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:35}); // {Tifa}
That's the reactor
and the Condor.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:44}); // {Tifa}
What's so wrong with having a Condor
on top of the reactor?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:56}); // {Tifa}
Condor's egg
A real work of nature.{PAUSE}We've got to protect
the life of the Planet.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:83}); // {Tifa}
Everyone, listen to
what I have to say.{PAUSE}I can't possibly leave
these people like this.{PAUSE}Let's do whatever
we can to help them.
All right?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:102}); // {Tifa}
Now is the time to dig in.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:114}); // {Tifa}
This Materia is really
out-of-this-world!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:122}); // {Tifa}
If that's the case,
then you should have told us.{PAUSE}There may have been
another way to fight Shinra.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:128}); // {Tifa}
No, I think what happened is good.
'Cause we didn't know
if we'd win.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:37}); // {Red XIII}
That's the reactor.
And the Condor.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:36}); // {Red XIII}
That's the reactor
and the Condor.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:47}); // {Red XIII}
The logic eludes me.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:46}); // {Red XIII}
It's not very logical.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:59}); // {Red XIII}
We're going to protect the reactor
in order to save the egg.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:58}); // {Red XIII}
So, to protect the egg,
are you gonna protect
the reactor?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:70}); // {Red XIII}
What are we going to do?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:69}); // {Red XIII}
You decide what
we're going to do.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:88}); // {Red XIII}
Got it.
I'm gonna lend a hand, too.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:87}); // {Red XIII}
Right.
Let me lend a hand, too.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:104}); // {Red XIII}
We can't afford to be beaten!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:133}); // {Red XIII}
We must get there before them
and stop them!
climbLadder({x:-403, y:73, z:-120, triangleId:143, advanceKey:Key.Up, animationId:3, facingDirection:192, speed:1});
climbLadder({x:-407, y:94, z:-497, triangleId:153, advanceKey:Key.Down, animationId:3, facingDirection:192, speed:1});
climbLadder({x:65, y:315, z:580, triangleId:171, advanceKey:Key.Up, animationId:5, facingDirection:96, speed:1});

climbLadder({x:207, y:908, z:580, triangleId:89, advanceKey:Key.Down, animationId:5, facingDirection:144, speed:1});
climbLadder({x:879, y:744, z:1114, triangleId:168, advanceKey:Key.Up, animationId:5, facingDirection:96, speed:1});
climbLadder({x:943, y:795, z:671, triangleId:86, advanceKey:Key.Down, animationId:5, facingDirection:96, speed:1});
climbLadder({x:1074, y:172, z:19, triangleId:22, advanceKey:Key.Down, animationId:5, facingDirection:96, speed:1});
climbLadder({x:1140, y:228, z:694, triangleId:26, advanceKey:Key.Up, animationId:5, facingDirection:96, speed:1});

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:16}); // {Cid}
A battlefield?
We can't overlook that.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:39}); // {Cid}
No matter how you look at it,
that's a reactor.
And on top of it,
is that the Condor?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:50}); // {Cid}
Huh?
I don't get it.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:63}); // {Cid}
You guys,
what are ya gonna do?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:74}); // {Cid}
Don't be so wishy-washy.
Hurry and make up your mind.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:81}); // {Cid}
If you've made up your mind,
let's just do it.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:84}); // {Cid}
If you go that far, what can I say?
Well, we'll be able to do something
if you leave it up to us.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:108}); // {Cid}
Damn!
I guess we have to protect
this area too.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:123}); // {Cid}
What the hell
did we fight for?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:129}); // {Cid}
Just forget about it.
Anyway, we're still alive.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:131}); // {Cid}
So the last Huge Materia
that Shinra's after's in the
underwater reactor in Junon?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:136}); // {Cid}
But ya know, Shinra's probably
on high alert
since we always mess with 'em.{PAUSE}How 'bout we take a break and go
see that little fella for a bit?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:142}); // {Cid}
Yeah, I'm worried 'bout
{Tifa}.
She may've collapsed
takin' care of the guy.{PAUSE}How 'bout checkin' in on 'em?
Down to {CYAN}Mideel{WHITE}!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:26}); // {Yuffie}
Is this about the jewels?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:48}); // {Yuffie}
I'm certain there must be
state-of-the-art Materia
inside the reactor. Am I right?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:60}); // {Yuffie}
Special Materia, huh?
Well, well,
things are getting interesting.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:71}); // {Yuffie}
If things go right,
we might even be able to
pray to that special Materia.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:79}); // {Yuffie}
Now we lost the Materia.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:89}); // {Yuffie}
Okay, it's settled.
We're gonna get the Materia,
right?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:105}); // {Yuffie}
If we lose here, all the Materia
we gathered will be for nothing.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:134}); // {Yuffie}
We gotta get there and stop 'em

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:24}); // {Cait Sith}
I know, I know, {Cloud}.
But let's listen for a bit.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:33}); // {Cait Sith}
Yeah, come to think of it
there was something.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:61}); // {Cait Sith}
I'm gonna leave it up
to you all.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:72}); // {Cait Sith}
I'll leave it up to you so
please do as you see fit.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:90}); // {Cait Sith}
Well then, let's do our best.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:106}); // {Cait Sith}
You're right.
If we lose here,
we'll be in great danger.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:118}); // {Cait Sith}
Hmm, you mean this?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:15}); // {Vincent}
What do you mean by that?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:25}); // {Vincent}
There's no harm in listening to them.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:38}); // {Vincent}
Come to think of it,
there was a reactor.
But I've never seen anything
shaped like it

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:62}); // {Vincent}
and come out in
one piece?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:73}); // {Vincent}
It's difficult to get back
what you've lost

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:80}); // {Vincent}
Have no regrets for
what's already past.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:107}); // {Vincent}
We must protect this area.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:135}); // {Vincent}
Getting to the reactor before them

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // Hello.
Do your best. We will, too.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // Hello.
I'm sorry but we're not
selling anything now.{PAUSE}We're using everything
we have for ourselves.
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // You hang in there!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // Sorry, but I can't sell you
anything now.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:109}); // Everyone, thanks.
I really mean it. Thanks.{PAUSE}Although there isn't anything
we can give you,
we'll make sure you can stop
in and stay any time.
So be sure to drop by.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // [Save Point]
Access the Menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.

dialogStrings: Fort Condor

[Save Point]
Access the Menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.

Hello.
I'm sorry but we're not
selling anything now.{PAUSE}We're using everything
we have for ourselves.

Hello.
Do your best. We will, too.

Sorry, but I can't sell you
anything now.
You hang in there!

Hmmn, now this is something,
I never thought anyone
would ever climb up here.{PAUSE}Your eyes are different.
Well, anyhow.
Any minute now, this will be
a battlefield against Shinra.{PAUSE}You'd better get down
before you get involved.

Hmmn, now this is something,
I never thought anyone
would ever climb up here.{PAUSE}Any minute now, this will be
a battlefield against Shinra.
You'd better get down
before you get involved.

{Barret}
Shinra?
The hell those jackasses
doing here?

{Tifa}
You mean Shinra?

{Aeris}
What do you mean,
'a battlefield'?

{Red XIII}
The Shinra

{Red XIII}
Shinra again.

{Yuffie}
The Shinra? Here too?
{Cait Sith}

{Vincent}
What do you mean by that?

{Cid}
A battlefield?
We can't overlook that.

It appears you have a problem
with Shinra, too.
After all, you climbed up here.{PAUSE}Why not listen to
what I have to say for a moment?

{Cloud}

{CHOICE}I guess so
{CHOICE}Not interested

{Tifa}
Oh, by all means.

{Cid}
All right, talk on!

{Barret}
The hell you talkin' about!?
They're all fightin'
the Shinra too!
You gonna ignore that!?

{Tifa}
{Cloud}, let's listen to
what they have to say.

{Aeris}
After all, we came all this way,
{Cloud}

{Cait Sith}
I know, I know, {Cloud}.
But let's listen for a bit.

{Vincent}
There's no harm in listening to them.

{Yuffie}
Is this about the jewels?

{Cid}
Man, she sure's cold.

Do you know what's at
the top of this mountain?

{Barret}
Huh?
Something's up there?

{Aeris}
A huge bird.

{Tifa}
Come on, let's get it together.

{Yuffie}
Look close, old man.

{Cait Sith}
Yeah, come to think of it
there was something.

{Cloud}
The reactor and the Condor.

{Tifa}
That's the reactor
and the Condor.

{Red XIII}
That's the reactor
and the Condor.

{Red XIII}
That's the reactor.
And the Condor.

{Vincent}
Come to think of it,
there was a reactor.
But I've never seen anything
shaped like it

{Cid}
